anar

Class EPlusEquipment.DaylightingControls

java.lang.Object
  anar.EPlusEquipment.DaylightingControls
All Implemented Interfaces:
EPlusInterface
Enclosing class:
EPlusEquipment
public class EPlusEquipment.DaylightingControls
extends java.lang.Object
implements EPlusInterface

class that defines the daylighting control of a specific zone
Assumptions:

  • There is only one reference point
  • This reference point is located .8 m above the center of the floor Face
  • Default illumination level requested is 500 lux
  • Dimming is continuous and can go down to null power and null luminance (no manipulation probability)
  • Glare index is not meaningful
Careful with non convex zones since the reference point may end up outside the zone. In general non-convex zones should be avoided since non-convexity prevents from using reflections in the solar model
